title: HDFC Bank continues aggressive deposit accretion, adds Rs 1.2 lakh crore in September quarter
description: HDFC Bank, Indiaâ€™s largest private lender, added over Rs 1.2 lakh crore in deposits in the September quarter, growing its deposit base by 15.1% to Rs 25 lakh crore. CASA deposits grew by 8%, while time deposits increased by 19.3%. Total advances grew by 7%, driven by commercial and rural banking, despite a decline in corporate loans.
